parameters.name: Accessibility
parameters.description:
The instance visibility.

*   PUBLIC: TensorBoard instances are visible to all members in the workspace.
*   PRIVATE: TensorBoard instances are visible only to you and the administrator of the workspace.

parameters.name: DisplayName
parameters.description: The TensorBoard instance name.

parameters.name: EndTime
parameters.description: The end time of the query. Use the UTC time when the TensorBoard instance is created to filter data. If you leave this parameter empty, the default value is the current time.

parameters.name: JobId
parameters.description: The job ID used to filter TensorBoard instances. For more information about how to obtain the ID of a job, see [ListJobs](~~459676~~).

parameters.name: Order
parameters.description:
The sorting order.

*   desc
*   asc

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The page number. Minimum value: 1.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of TensorBoard instances per page.

parameters.name: PaymentType
parameters.description:
The billing method of TensorBoard instances.

*   Free: the TensorBoard instance that uses free resources.
*   Postpaid: the TensorBoard instance that uses pay-as-you-go resources.

parameters.name: QuotaId
parameters.description:
The resource quota ID.

> 

*   Only whitelisted users can use resource quotas to create TensorBoard instances. If you want to use this feature, contact us.

*   This parameter takes effect only when TensorBoard instances use resource quotas.

parameters.name: ShowOwn
parameters.description: Specifies whether to return only the TensorBoard instances created by the current logon account.

parameters.name: SortBy
parameters.description:
The returned field used to sort TensorBoard instances.

*   DisplayName: the name of the TensorBoard instance.
*   GmtCreateTime: the time when the TensorBoard instance is created.

parameters.name: SourceId
parameters.description: The data source ID. For more information about how to obtain the ID of a job, see [ListJobs](~~459676~~).

parameters.name: SourceType
parameters.description: The data source associated with the TensorBoard instance. This parameter is no longer used. Only Deep Learning Containers (DLC) training jobs are supported.

parameters.name: StartTime
parameters.description: The start time of the query. Use the UTC time when the TensorBoard instance is created to filter data. If you leave this parameter empty, the default value is seven days before the current time.

parameters.name: Status
parameters.description:
The TensorBoard instance status. Valid values:

*   Creating
*   Running
*   Stopped
*   Succeeded
*   Failed

parameters.name: TensorboardId
parameters.description: The TensorBoard instance ID used to filter TensorBoard instances.

parameters.name: UserId
parameters.description: The user ID.

parameters.name: Username
parameters.description: The username.

parameters.name: Verbose
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to return the information about the TensorBoard instance.

*   true
*   false

parameters.name: WorkspaceId
parameters.description: The workspace ID. Obtain a list of TensorBoard instances based on the workspace ID.
